title: Victor Korchnoi vs Magnus Carlsen - A Rare Cross-Generational Battle
description:
#agadmator Viktor Korchnoi vs Magnus Carlsen
"Father Time and Baby New Year" (game of the day Jan-01-2007)
SmartFish Chess Masters (2004), Drammen NOR, rd 3, Dec-29 
Tarrasch Defense: Prague Variation. Main Line (D34).

1. c4 Nf6 2. Nc3 c5 3. g3 e6 4. Nf3 Nc6 5. Bg2 d5 6. cd5 ed5 7. d4 Be7 8. Be3 c4 9. Ne5 O-O 10. O-O Be6 11. Nc4 dc4 12. d5 Nd5 13. Nd5 Bf6 14. Qd2 Bd4 15. Nf4 Be3 16. Qe3 Re8 17. Rfd1 Qf6 18. Bc6 bc6 19. Qd4 Qd4 20. Rd4 Bd5 21. Rad1 c3 22. Nd5 cd5 23. bc3 Re2 24. Rd5 g6 25. R5d2 Rd2 26. Rd2 Rc8 27. Rc2 Rc4 28. Kf1 Kf8 29. Ke2 Ke7 30. Kd3 Ra4 31. Rd2 Ke6 32. c4 Ra3 33. Ke4 h5 34. f4 f6 35. Re2 Ra4 36. Kd4 Kd6 37. Rf2 Ra5 38. Kc3 Kc5 39. Kb3 Ra6 40. Rd2
